ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 26 May 1999, Bill Butler wrote:

> i remember lvl 10 and 11 as a magician. I would say that CB is not the answer. I suggest you go
> to steamfont on the hill pass the windmill. Kill drakes, (let pet take
> the heat, and use fireshield on the pet. give hime a +10 sv fire),
> harpys,elementals, and watch out for HERO. I blew throught 10 and
> 11 in 3 days or about 10hr 1bar /hour.


Thanks for this advice and to all the others who have given me really
excellent advice on how/what to hunt and how to get away. (I especially
like the jump in the river option.)

I play on Rallos Zek and until moving into Steamfont I never had any
problems with Pkers, since most of them seem to be driven by profit and
magicians tend not to have valuable items the way other classes do. Last
night, I was PK'd once and had several other attempts made. I was also the
victim of attempted extortion (by another High Elf, of all things,
demanding taxes for travelling in "her lands", if you can believe that.),
which I am happy to say failed because of a very nice 12th level gnome
magician who was helping me out.It seems Steamfont is under the control of
a PK guild and is not the safest place for a High Elf.

I am considering starting another magician on another server, so that when
I don't feel like playing with bullies who are going to beat me up and
take my lunch money, I won't have to. :) Can anyone recommend a good
server, one that has some serious role-players and a minimum amount of
jerks?

Thanks,

Anya
10th lvl Magician
Rallos Zek
